name: chrono-tracker
description: This project is a web-based application called **Chrono-Tracker** designed to be a comprehensive hour-tracking and project management system. It will allow users to manage projects, track time spent by various team members, and handle high-level planning. The system will be built with a decoupled architecture, where a single backend API serves data to a modern frontend, allowing for potential future integrations with other applications.
author: RubenVanRijen

scripts.lint: npm run lint:adonis && npm run lint:next && npm run lint:shared
scripts.lint:parallel: concurrently "npm --prefix backend run lint" "npm --prefix frontend run lint" "npm --prefix shared run lint"
scripts.lint:fix: npm run lint:fix:adonis && npm run lint:fix:next && npm run lint:fix:shared
scripts.lint:fix:parallel: concurrently "npm --prefix backend run lint:fix" "npm --prefix frontend run lint:fix" "npm --prefix shared run lint:fix"
scripts.format: npm run format:adonis && npm run format:next && npm run format:shared
scripts.format:parallel: concurrently "npm --prefix backend run format" "npm --prefix frontend run format" "npm --prefix shared run format"
scripts.format:check: npm run format:check:adonis && npm run format:check:next && npm run format:check:shared
scripts.format:check:parallel: concurrently "npm --prefix backend run format:check" "npm --prefix frontend run format:check" "npm --prefix shared run format:check"
